forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 13C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High near 55F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
